title: Sub Needed for Team
body:
As I've posted lately I've been recruiting people for Deltix Gaming. One last request is I need a substitute player who can play all lanes. I will not be online on League until 2:30-2:40pm (New York Time) so If your interested please contact me on this post in comments. I'm also making an article on a word document about our team so yeah... Requirement is you must be level 30 and have skype to talk with the team (mic needed) 
Thanks, 
DLTX Zombie

replies.body: I can sub I have mained all positions at 1 time ad me in game LeftyRaydy.
Id love to sub if possible I fill all the requirements. Message me on league

> [{quoted}](name=DerpyTheUnicorn,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=MUE20EAj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-06T17:28:11.150+0000)
>
> Id love to sub if possible I fill all the requirements. Message me on league

Sounds good I'll add you in when I get on
